name: Treasures of the Deep (itch) (Shane Urbas)
description:
Treasures of the Deep was created in 9 days for the GodotWildJam 41.  I have been learning video game development for 1.5 months at this point.  The game represents the main idea however due to time constraints and experience.  I was not able to complete the full vision.

As this is a learning experience for me, constructive criticism is welcomed.

Controls

Move: 
WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Scan Fish: Move your scanner over the fish and after a few seconds the fish will be uncovered.

Collect Pearls:
Collect 10 pearls to unlock the hidden key and treasure chest.

Treasure Chest:
Once you get the key you can unlock the treasure chest and gain its riches.
